name: Take Care, Washbear!
description:
Take Care, Washbear!

Got "dirty laundry?" Need something cleaned? Help Washbear take care of it, at Washbear's Full Service Laundromat! Serve your customers day to day and help clean up the town. There's no mistake Washbear can't destroy!

Controls Move:Arrow keysInteract:Spacebar Credits Programming:Vinzelsior, Tschabi185Graphics:
